title: Interborough Rapid Transit Company
Status: Incorporated into the New York City Subway
Opened: 1903; 116 years ago (1903) ,  (acquisition of the Manhattan Railway Company)
Closed: 1940; 79 years ago (1940) ,  (acquisition by the NYC Board of Transportation)
